DOC.brief_summary: The study will explore multiple mobility function tests as well as functional and neuropsychological tests in elderly subjects at risk for falls and disability, before and after 4-month exercise and/or Vitamin D intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Of Exercise And Vitamin D In Frail Elderly Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The study was terminated on 10Jan2008. This was a strategic decision not related to safety, efficacy, or feasibility of trial.
DOC.criteria: Elderly subjects with moderate frailty residing in assisted living facilities. Presence of progressive, unstable chronic disease; hyperparathyroidism, hypercalcemia.
